subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Pablo Cuevas, who is seeded third, beat Steve Darcis, 6-3, 6-4, in the Swedish Open quarterfinals in Bastad.
snippet: The defending champion Pablo Cuevas, who is seeded third, beat Steve Darcis, 6-3, 6-4, in the Swedish Open quarterfinals in Bastad.
